125608.en:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>My name is Light Guide Nazuna... Under oath of our master,
the Sacred Light Lord, Warrior <pc>, I shall
guide you.<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125608.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>「我が名は　光導使ナズナ……
　我らが主　聖光教主と　交わせし誓いのもと
　闘戦士　<pc>を　導かん。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125608.ko:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>: 제 이름은 빛의 인도자 나즈나……
　우리의 주인 성광교주님과 나눈 맹세에 따라
　투전사 {pc}|hpp(을,를) 인도하겠나이다.<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125608.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>我是光导使荠菜……
在我与我主圣光教主的誓约下，
前来引导斗战士<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125608.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>我是光導使奈津那……
在我與我主聖光教主的誓約下，
前來引導鬥戰士<pc>。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>

125609.en:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>Guided by a profound purpose, having woven a beam of
light. When thousands of light beams converge, before
long, they inevitably become Sacred Light.<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125609.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>「深遠なる意思に導かれ　紡がれし光芒。 
　幾千もの光芒集いて　束になれば
　やがて　聖光となるは必定なり。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125609.ko:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>: 심오한 의지의 인도가 자아낸 한 줄기 빛.
　그 빛 수천이 모여 다발이 되니
　마침내 성광을 이루리로다.<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125609.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>光芒在深远的意志引导下编织成形，
无数光芒汇聚在一起，终将成为圣光。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125609.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>光芒在深遠的意志引導下編織成形，
無數光芒彙聚在一起，
終將成為聖光。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>

125610.en:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>O Sacred Light, with your great gleaming, please rain
hope all around this chaotic world!<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125610.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>「聖光よ　その大いなる輝きをもって
　この混迷の世界に　あまねく降り注ぐ
　希望となりたまえ！<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125610.ko:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>: 성광이여, 그 위대한 빛으로
　이 혼란한 세계를 널리 비출
　희망이 되어 주소서!<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125610.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>圣光啊，
请让那伟大的光辉洒遍这迷乱的世界，
成为希望吧！<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125610.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>聖光啊，請讓那偉大的光輝
灑遍這迷亂的世界，
成為希望吧！<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>

125611.en:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>With that, we're alright. Now then, hold the Compassion
Crest up high, okay.<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125611.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>「これで　よし。
　それじゃ　慈愛の紋章を　高くかかげてね。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125611.ko:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>: 이제 됐어.
　그럼 자애의 문장을 높이 치켜들어 봐.<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125611.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>这样就可以了。
那么，高高举起慈爱纹章吧。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125611.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>這樣就可以了。
那麼，高高舉起慈愛紋章吧。<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>

125612.en: <pc> held the Compassion Crest up to the sky.
125612.ja: <pc>は　慈愛の紋章を空高く　かかげた。

125613.en:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>Now, having woven the Sacred Light, open the next
path to raise Warrior <pc>'s power of
compassion!<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125613.ja:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>「今　聖光を紡ぎし 
　闘戦士　<pc>の　慈愛のチカラを捧げ
　次なる道を　切り開かん！<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125613.ko:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>: 성광을 자아낸
　투전사 <pc>의 자애의 힘을 바쳐
　다음 길을 열리라!<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125613.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>织起圣光，
献上斗战士<pc>慈爱的力量，
开辟新的道路！<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
125613.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n03841 _normal m00001>現在織起聖光，
獻上鬥戰士<pc>慈愛的力量，
開闢新的道路！<stop_lip_animation n03841 CLOSE_MOUTH>
